title: The Abbot
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: If thou art wise, thouwilt make for Lockerbie so soon as thy foot touches dry land, and letthe packet find another bearer; at all rates, look it miscarries not."

title: The Abbot

title: Provost-Marshal: a romance of the middle shires
author: Moncreiff, Frederick Charles
snippet: With the Laird was Will Johnstone of Lockerbie;and the third stranger was Sir Robert Maxwell ofOrchard ton, whose presence at once explained thepurpose of what was about to pass.
